author: Flo
content:
ROTFLOL - first at Ted's comment - and then I have to laugh again at a comment Becky Miller made way back in 2007 at a photo workshop taught by Craig Tanner and Marti Jeffers - Craig and Marti had been showing us their collections of assorted lenses and we were all drooling over them.

Someone mentioned lens lust, at which point Becky piped up very innocently with "Lens lust results in Lensbabies."

So, Andreas, even though your lens lust resulted in some other kind of lens, I have to agree with Ted - we'll have to tie you up to the mast each time before you get anywhere near those sirens called new lens models.
